entry.title: Glasgow and Edinburgh derbies, ultras and record attendance in store as SWPL prepares to take centre stage
entry.summary: The women’s game within Scottish football has made great strides across the last five years. There has been qualification for both the European Championship and World Cup. The national side has made Hampden Park its home and attracted big crowds, while players can be found at the likes of Real Madrid, Chelsea and in America.
